title: Patch 4.21
body:
rito when will you release patch 4.21 and are you going to nerf lee sin, zed and fizz?
pls tell us we would like to know.

replies.body: They always announce patches a few days before they go live. If you don't see it in NEWS then it's more than a few days away.
And NOW the patch notes are up. No set release time so it could be any time in the next 5 days.

Warwick was never good until they released the new jungle
now he is OP just like Fiddle Sticks, Pantheon and Lee Sin the new jungle is way harder to sustain in now
that's why champs like WW are OP in the new jungle because they have a lot of sustain
Thank You,  the link was most helpful.
Patch notes have already been released. Check gameplay balance section for the thread.

I cannot find the thread you are talking about
could you put a link?
